smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function bind appears to be too complex.

smells.name: EmptySecondaryConstructor
smells.description: Empty block of code detected. As they serve no purpose they should be removed.

instances.message: This empty block of code can be removed.

smells.name: PackageNaming
smells.description: Package names should match the naming convention set in the configuration.

instances.message: Package name should match the pattern: ^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: findViewById(R.id.github_link) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
findViewById(R.id.canada_license_text) cannot be safely cast to TextView.
holder cannot be safely cast to QuakeViewHolder.

smells.name: UnsafeCallOnNullableType
smells.description: It will throw a NullPointerException at runtime if your nullable value is null.

instances.message: Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.
Calling !! on a nullable type will throw a NullPointerException at runtime in case the value is null. It should be avoided.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'androidx.room.Query' is unused.
The import 'com.geo.GeoQuake.models.FeatureCollection' is unused.
The import 'android.content.Intent' is unused.
The import 'android.view.View' is unused.
The import 'com.geo.GeoQuake.models.FeatureCollection' is unused.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class Earthquake defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: USA can be a `const val`.
CANADA can be a `const val`.

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file AboutActivity.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file WebInfoActivity.kt is not ending with a new line.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of AboutActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of WebInfoActivity.

smells.name: ReturnCount
smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

instances.message: Function getItem has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.
Function getPageTitle has 3 return statements which exceeds the limit of 2.

smells.name: MaxLineLength
smells.description: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

instances.message: Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.
Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.
Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.
Line detected that is longer than the defined maximum line length in the code style.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

instances.message: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
